creator: ms53@inf.tu-dresden.de
text:
Type mismatch: Cannot convert from char to byte

This compile error should occur also if jikes is used to compile, since VAJ 
uses it.

creator: hillion@apache.org
text:
From the Java specification:
<<
The compile-time narrowing of constants means that code such as: 

byte theAnswer = 42;

is allowed.
>>

This is the case in Base64EncoderStream: the compiler can check at compile 
time that the given chars can be converted to bytes without loss of precision.

This is a VisualAge bug.
